TOOLS
Interactive Map (WIP)
Skill Tree Planner (WIP)

This tool will include an interactive map of the whole Persist world, most likely showing key Gathering Nodes and Quest Locations.

Development will require a full world map, either ideally generated/provided by CipSoft or manually drawn by a player.

This tool will be developed much closer to the full release of the game, considering that the map is constantly updated.
